sn33.2:4.2: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta said to the Buddha:
sn33.2:4.3: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why these various misconceptions arise in the world? That is:
sn33.2:4.4: the world is eternal, or not eternal …
sn33.2:4.5: after death, a Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist.”
sn33.2:4.6: “Vaccha, it is because of not knowing feeling, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
sn33.2:4.7: that these various misconceptions arise in the world.
sn33.2:4.10: This is the cause, this is the reason.”
